sys_template.name: RPN-SD-Password-Active Directory (Personal Account)
sys_template.short_description: Cannot log in to user account with PC password
sys_template.template:
short_description=Cannot log in to user account with PC password^instructions=Cannot log in with PC password
Please recommend that the user sets up for the PC Password Reset Portal and show them how to, if they don't know how.
Amend CI for application effected (e.g. Acusend, LoginPC, etc)^affected_system=Desktops (RPN)^cmdb_ci=SFT-LOGINPC-RPN^close_notes=Unlocked Account in AD [ ]Reset Users Password [ ] Informed the user about the PC Password Reset Portal [ ]^contact_type=phone^impact=^category=^subcategory=^close_code=
